component.name: Qrypt
component.summary: Flexible and privacy-first app for manual text encryption, compression, and obfuscation

description.p: Qrypt is a comprehensive Flutter application for text encryption, compression, obfuscation, and digital signing, with support for multiple algorithms, customizable processing pipelines, and quantum-safe cryptography. It puts full control in the hands of the user, enabling secure message sharing across any medium (e.g., SMS, chat, email) when encryption is restricted or unavailable.

ul.li: Encryption Methods: AES-CBC, AES-CTR, AES-GCM, RSA, RSA+Sign, ML-KEM (Kyber).
Quantum-Safe Cryptography: ML-KEM for key encapsulation, ML-DSA for digital signatures.
Compression Algorithms: GZip, LZ4, Brotli, Zstd.
Obfuscation Techniques: Character Mapping (EN1/EN2, FA1/FA2), Base64, ROT13, XOR.
Smart Tagging System: Automatic method detection and version-aware parsing.
Key Management: Generate and manage RSA, ML-KEM, and ML-DSA key pairs.
Security: Quantum resistance, hybrid security, message integrity, and more.

description.p: Multiple bug fixes and logic improvements.
⚠️ .env Compatibility Warning: The original .env file was lost. Obfuscation mappings have been regenerated. Obfuscated data from earlier versions is not compatible with v4.3.1+.
Added: ML-DSA (Dilithium) Signing for post-quantum digital signatures and a new key management page.
Fixed: Obfuscation logic for one-to-one reversible mappings, UI layout stability, and theming.
Added RSA support, multi key pair support, fixed mapped obfuscations bug.
